patthana15.59:4.1: Sappītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:4.2: Appītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:4.3: Sappītikaṃ kusalañca appītikaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:5.1: Sappītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:5.2: Appītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:5.3: Sappītikaṃ akusalañca appītikaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
